title: Oasis
info: The Oasis is a naturally spawning mini-biome that may be found on the Surface layer of the Desert biome. They consist of a sizable body of water, surrounded by multiple palm trees, usually in the middle of the desert biome. The area around the oasis itself will include shrubbery such as mini cacti, ferns, and flowers. Inside the lake itself can grow Cattail plants and usually has multiple dragonflies flying around and above the surface of the water.
